DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness use Chondro-Gide® collagen membrane either suture glued compare microfracture alone treatment symptomatic cartilage defect knee .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Trial Comparing Chondro-Gide® Microfracture Alone Treatment Knee Cartilage Defects .
DOC.detailed_description: - Prospective , randomize , active treatment-controlled , open-label multicenter study ( 40 site US EU ) . - All subject meet preoperative screening eligibility criterion randomize treatment Chondro-Gide® either suture glued Microfracture alone . - Eligible consent subject randomize 1:1:1 ratio use centralize randomization list receive one follow treatment : Group I : Microfracture alone ; Group II : Microfracture cover Chondro-Gide® membrane glue fibrin glue ( AMIC glue ) ; Group III : Microfracture cover Chondro-Gide® membrane suture ( AMIC suture ) - All subject assess interval post-procedure ( 6 week , 3 month , 1,2 5 year ) . - Subjects require follow strict pre-specified post-surgery rehabilitation protocol specific defect location . - Measures assess effectiveness safety conduct follow-up . - Safety assess collection adverse event timepoints .
